scenes.description: Introduction screen showing the Hololive English -Myth- members and event details.
Performance of 'Shiny Smily Story' by Hololive English -Myth-.

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を 見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to see the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢 手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to grasp that dream

subtitles.original: それぞれ 違った 心で
subtitles.english: With our each different hearts

subtitles.original: 走り出そう
subtitles.english: Let's start running

subtitles.original: Shiny Smily Story
subtitles.english: Shiny Smily Story

subtitles.original: Lyrics: 金丸佳史 (onetrap)
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Yoshifumi Kanamaru (onetrap)

subtitles.original: Composition/Arrangement: 中野領太 (onetrap)
subtitles.english: Composition/Arrangement: Ryota Nakano (onetrap)

subtitles.original: どこを見ても真っ暗な場所に芽生えてた
subtitles.english: It sprouted in a place where it was pitch black

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな希望にこの瞳奪われた
subtitles.english: This eye was stolen by a just a tiny hope

subtitles.original: 不安で揺れる心を上手くチューニングして
subtitles.english: Tuning well my heart shaking with anxiety

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな勇気を振り絞っていたよ
subtitles.english: I was squeezing out just a tiny bit of courage

subtitles.original: 諦めの街 手に手をとって進む
subtitles.english: In the city of giving up, let's take each other's hands

subtitles.original: 苦しい時も私は一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because even in painful times, I am not alone

subtitles.original: だからもっと 夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: So I want to chase my dream more

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: The excitement won't stop

subtitles.original: 世界を変えていく
subtitles.english: Changing the world

subtitles.original: 輝き捧げてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you a brilliance

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try to access

subtitles.original: 後悔なんて想像させない
subtitles.english: I won't let you imagine any regrets

subtitles.original: それぞれ 違った 心で
subtitles.english: With our each different hearts

subtitles.original: 走り出そう
subtitles.english: Let's start running

subtitles.original: 仮想の空に輝くこの眩しい思いは
subtitles.english: This dazzling feeling shining in the virtual sky

subtitles.original: 見たことのない光をリアルに届けるよ
subtitles.english: I'll deliver a never-before-seen light to reality

subtitles.original: いつも聞こえるエールはここにキャプチャーして
subtitles.english: Capture here the cheers I always hear

subtitles.original: また新しい光を探したくなるよ
subtitles.english: I'll want to search for new light again

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔は 保存して進む
subtitles.english: Saving your smile, let's move forward

subtitles.original: 悲しい時に 見返すよ
subtitles.english: I'll look back at it when I'm sad

subtitles.original: 力がわくから
subtitles.english: Because strength will well up

subtitles.original: 胸を張って 夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: With my chest held high, I want to chase my dream

subtitles.original: 奇跡のストーリー
subtitles.english: The story of a miracle

subtitles.original: 一緒に作ろう
subtitles.english: Let's make together

subtitles.original: 終わらない夢を
subtitles.english: An endless dream

subtitles.original: 誰一人欠かせない
subtitles.english: Not a single person can be missed

subtitles.original: 愛が待つこの世界
subtitles.english: In this world where love waits

subtitles.original: それぞれ 違った 心で
subtitles.english: With our each different hearts

subtitles.original: 彩れ
subtitles.english: Color it

subtitles.original: フレーズにこの鼓動を鳴らし続けたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep ringing this heartbeat in the phrase

subtitles.original: 終わらない世界に溢れ出す笑顔たち
subtitles.english: Smiles overflowing into the endless world
